IF(TORCHSCRIPT_FRONTEND)
    IF (CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME MATCHES "Linux")
        list(APPEND CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/torch/binary)
        find_package(Torch REQUIRED)
	add_library(libtorch INTERFACE)
	add_dependencies(libtorch torch)
	target_include_directories(libtorch SYSTEM INTERFACE ${TORCH_INCLUDE_DIRS})
	target_link_libraries(libtorch INTERFACE ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/torch/binary/lib/libc10.so ${TORCH_LIBRARY})
    ENDIF()
ENDIF()
